group.name: Plugin Commands: ZigBee 3.0 Test Harness
group.description: The test harness commands are used to test various unusual functionality or behavior of a remote device.

command.description: Enable the printing of beacon requests and received beacons.
Disable the printing of beacon requests and received beacons.
Enable the printing of ZDO commands.
Disable the printing of ZDO commands.
Enable the printing of network commands.
Disable the printing of network commands.
Enable the printing of APS commands.
Disable the printing of APS commands.
Send a beacon request.
Send a beacon.

arg.name: options
arg.description: The negative behavior options for this command.

command.description: Send a Rejoin Request command.

arg.name: destination
arg.description: The destination address of the command.

command.description: Send a Rejoin Response command.

arg.name: newAddress
arg.description: The new short address of the destination node.

arg.name: status
arg.description: The status of the rejoin.

arg.name: destination
arg.description: The destination address of the command.

command.description: Send a Network Leave command.

arg.name: rejoin
arg.description: Whether or not the device should rejoin.

arg.name: request
arg.description: Whether or not this command is a request.

arg.name: removeChildren
arg.description: Whether or not the leaving device should remove its children.

arg.name: destination
arg.description: The destination address of the command.

arg.name: options
arg.description: The negative behavior options for this command.

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 nwk nwk-leave-supression on
command.description: Supress network leave commands.

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 nwk nwk-leave-supression off
command.description: Do not supress network leave commands.

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 nwk nwk-key-supression on
command.description: Supress network leave commands.

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 nwk nwk-key-supression off
command.description: Do not supress network leave commands.
Get the current network update id.
Set the network update id in the current network parameters block.

arg.name: updateId
arg.description: The new network update id.

command.description: Send an APS remove device command.

arg.name: parentLongAddress
arg.description: The long address of the parent whose child will be removed.

arg.name: destinationLongAddress
arg.description: The long address of the node which will be removed.

arg.name: options
arg.description: The negative behavior options for this command.

command.description: Configures the APS remove device command handling.

arg.name: options
arg.description: The negative behavior options for this command.

command.description: Send an APS request key command.

arg.name: destination
arg.description: The short address destination of the command.

arg.name: keyType
arg.description: The key type in the command payload.

arg.name: partnerAddress
arg.description: The partner address for the requested link key.

arg.name: options
arg.description: The negative behavior options for this command.

command.description: Start the scan request process.

arg.name: linkInitiator
arg.description: The link initiator bit in scan requests.

arg.name: unused
arg.description: This argument is unsed.

arg.name: options
arg.description: The negative behavior options for this command.

command.description: Start a distributed network on which to perform ZLL operations.

arg.name: panId
arg.description: The PAN ID that will be used.

arg.name: options
arg.description: The negative behavior options for this command.

command.description: Print out whether or not the device is currently performing the scan process for touchlinking.

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 zdo unbind unicast
command.description: Sends an unbind request for a unicast binding to the target device.

arg.name: target
arg.description: Target node ID

arg.name: source eui64
arg.description: The source EUI64 of the binding (the remote device's EUI64)

arg.name: source endpoint
arg.description: The source endpoint of the binding.

arg.name: clusterID
arg.description: The cluster ID to unbind.

arg.name: destinationEUI64
arg.description: The destination EUI64 in the binding (usually the local node's EUI64

arg.name: destEndpoint
arg.description: The destination endpoint of the binding

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 zdo unbind group
command.description: Sends an unbind request for a multicast binding to the target device.

arg.name: target
arg.description: Target node ID

arg.name: source eui64
arg.description: The source EUI64 of the binding (the remote device's EUI64)

arg.name: source endpoint
arg.description: The source endpoint of the binding.

arg.name: clusterID
arg.description: The cluster ID to unbind.

arg.name: groupAddress
arg.description: The group address in the binding

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 zdo in-cl-list add
command.description: Add clusters to the known server (in) clusters on this device.

arg.name: clusterId
arg.description: Server cluster id

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 zdo in-cl-list clear
command.description: Clear the ZDO list of server (in) clusters.

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 zdo out-cl-list add
command.description: Add clusters to the known client (out) clusters on this device.

arg.name: clusterId
arg.description: Client cluster ids

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 zdo out-cl-list clear
command.description: Clear the ZDO list of client (out) clusters.
Sends a node descriptor request to a given target device

arg.name: target
arg.description: Two byte address for the target device.

command.description: Send a ZDO Management Leave command to the target device.

arg.name: target
arg.description: Target node ID

arg.name: removeChildren
arg.description: Remove children

arg.name: rejoin
arg.description: Rejoin after leave

command.description: Send a ZDO route request command to the target.

arg.name: target
arg.description: Target node ID

arg.name: index
arg.description: The index of the remote node's routing table to request.

command.description: Send a ZDO Power Descriptor Request to the target device.

arg.name: target
arg.description: Target node ID

command.description: Send a ZDO Bind command to a device specified in the command arguments.

arg.name: destination
arg.description: Two byte destination node id

arg.name: source Endpoint
arg.description: Remote device's source endpoint to bind

arg.name: destEndpoint
arg.description: Remote endpoint to bind

arg.name: cluster
arg.description: Cluster on which to bind

arg.name: remoteEUI64
arg.description: Remote node EUI64

arg.name: destEUI64
arg.description: Binding's dest EUI64. Usually the local node's EUI64

command.description: Send a ZDO bind command to a device specified to create a groupcast binding.

arg.name: shortAddress
arg.description: The destination of the ZDO command

arg.name: sourceEndpoint
arg.description: Remote device's source endpoint to bind

arg.name: destEndpoint
arg.description: Remote endpoint to bind

arg.name: destination
arg.description: Two byte destination address for the binding

arg.name: cluster
arg.description: Cluster on which to bind

arg.name: srcAddress
arg.description: The source IEEE address for the binding

command.description: Send a ZDO address request.

arg.name: ieeeAddress
arg.description: The long address of the destination.

arg.name: type
arg.description: The type of the rejoin request.

arg.name: startIndex
arg.description: The start index for the requested elements of the associated devices list if the type of this command is Extended response.

arg.name: destination
arg.description: The destination address of the command.

arg.name: options
arg.description: The negative behavior options for this command.

command.description: Send an IEEE address request.

arg.name: addrOfInterest
arg.description: The short address of interest

arg.name: type
arg.description: The request type.

arg.name: startIndex
arg.description: The start index for the requested elements of the associated devices list if the type of this command is Extended response.

arg.name: destination
arg.description: The destination address of the command.

arg.name: options
arg.description: The negative behavior options for this command.

command.description: Send a ZDO MGMT-Bind (Binding Table) Request to the target device.

arg.name: target
arg.description: Target node ID

arg.name: startIndex
arg.description: Starting index into table query

command.description: Send a ZDO MGMT-LQI (LQI Table) Request to the target device.

arg.name: target
arg.description: Target node ID

arg.name: startIndex
arg.description: Starting index into table query

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 nwk ieee-addr-rsp-config reset
command.description: Configure the next outgoing IEEE address request.

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 nwk ieee-addr-rsp-config issuer-nwk-address-remote-dev
command.description: Configure the next outgoing IEEE address request.

command.cli: plugin test-harness z3 nwk ieee-addr-rsp-config status-device-not-found
command.description: Configure the next outgoing IEEE address request.

Rebroadcast a "fake" ZDO device announce. The device sets random frame counter values to appear as though the DeviceAnnounce has been rebroadcasted from another device on the network out of range of the DUT.

arg.name: shortAddress
arg.description: Short address of the fake device announce

arg.name: ieeeAddress
arg.description: IEEE address of the fake device announce

command.description: Configuration command to set up OTA server.

arg.name: shortAddress
arg.description: Short Address

arg.name: destinationEndpoint
arg.description: Destination Endpoint

arg.name: manufacturerCode
arg.description: Manufacturer Code.

arg.name: imageType
arg.description: Image Type.

arg.name: fileVersion
arg.description: File Version

arg.name: fileSize
arg.description: File Size

command.description: Configuration command to set up OTA server.
Send a ZCL ReadAttribute command.

arg.name: clusterId
arg.description: The cluster ID in the command.

arg.name: attributeId
arg.description: The attribute ID in the command.

arg.name: destination
arg.description: The destination of the command.

arg.name: srcEndpoint
arg.description: The source endpoint of the command.

arg.name: dstEndpoint
arg.description: The destination endpoint of the command.

arg.name: profileId
arg.description: The profile ID in the command.

command.description: Resets the device to a factory new state (empty tables, attributes at default values, no events queued etc) without resetting the any of the physical hardware that could cause the device to not operate on the same serial connection.
Print the platform information for this device.
Set the PAN ID to be used by the Network Creator plugin.

arg.name: panId
arg.description: The PAN ID for the Network Creator plugin to use.

command.description: Set the node ID to be used on the device.

arg.name: nodeId
arg.description: The node ID to use as this device's short ID.

command.description: Enable using the legacy profile of 0xC05E for ZLL commands.
Disable using the legacy profile of 0xC05E for ZLL commands.
Set the node ID to be used on the device.

arg.name: mode
arg.description: The device mode.

command.description: Clear the install code from the device.
Clear the install code from the device.

arg.name: installCode
arg.description: The install code for this device to use.
